seo: 网康,NS-ASG安全网关,任意文件读取漏洞
seo_en: Netcon,NS-ASG Security Gateway,Arbitrary File Read Vulnerability
summary: 该插件用于检测网康 NS-ASG安全网关是否存在任意文件读取漏洞，通过构造特定请求判断是否可以成功读取目标文件。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the Netcon NS-ASG Security Gateway has an arbitrary file read vulnerability by constructing specific requests to determine if the target file can be successfully read.
